alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 9:06AM CDT until May 19 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Pembina, Walsh, Kittson and Marshall Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Pembina and Kittson Counties. Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Richland and Cass Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Pembina. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 39.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 40.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM CDT Tuesday was 41.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday morning and continue falling to 35.5 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
